title: Gather Requirements
description: Collect and document requirements for network segmentation, including private virtual interfaces, transit gateways, and VPN connections.

title: Design Network Architecture
description: Design the overall network architecture, including the placement of private virtual interfaces, transit gateways, and VPN connections.

title: Implement Private Virtual Interfaces
description: Develop and test the implementation of private virtual interfaces for network segmentation.

title: Implement Transit Gateways
description: Develop and test the implementation of transit gateways for network segmentation.

title: Implement VPN Connections
description: Develop and test the implementation of VPN connections for network segmentation.

title: Security Audit
description: Perform a security audit on the network segmentation implementation to identify and mitigate potential vulnerabilities.

title: Integration and System Testing
description: Conduct integration and system testing to ensure the proper functioning of the network segmentation implementation.

title: Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the network segmentation implementation, including user guides and technical references.

title: Deployment and Release
description: Deploy and release the network segmentation implementation to production environments.
